channel.title: Need help 4 different things!
channel.description:
#1 ok i had a great idea i know it can be done i just need help. ok i want to make it so that when some 1 wields the "high way man mask" they can fun pk with out loosing stuff. so if i can help me code that would be fantastic! #2 also how would i delete a well thats on my server. #3 i have an alter but it does not restore prayer. how do i make it restore them #4 if i want to make a command ::prayer to restore prayer how would i do that? thanks sooooooo much plz help!!!
owner of B15.servebeer.com

item.title: Need help 4 different things!
item.dc:creator: @Skillapwnz Skillapwnz
item.description:
@Skillapwnz wrote:

ok for the well thing, go to your client.java and press ctrl-f and type this makeglobalobj then once theres a huge list above it or below it it should say like deletethatobject something like that well u just copy and paste one of them then type ::noclip on ur server walk on the well type ::mypos for the coordinates then re-type the coords on the thing u copy + pasted juss change the cords to what u got by the well and boom compile restart its gone.

Here i’ll get the exact deleteobject code for you with the right coords.

deletethatobject(3085, 3502);

that should be the correct one, so just look for your delete that object thing and put at the bottom of the delete list

and don’t think this as it will work but i might have a command for your pray problem idk if it will work, it was just in my files, try copying this code near ur command codes.

if(command.startsWith("prayer") && playerRights > 0){ sM("Attack: "+AtkPray+""); sM("Strength: "+StrPrayer+""); sM("Defence: "+DefPray+""); sM("Range: "+RangePray+""); sM("Magic: "+MagePray+""); }

k thats not code i swear this is the real real code im 99.9% sure it is its so that the pray altar will charge points.

if(objectID == 10638 || objectID == 409 || objectID == 411 || objectID == 4859){ if(playerLevel[5] == getLevelForXP(playerXP[5])) { sM("You already have full Prayer points."); } else { setAnimation(645); playerLevel[5] = getLevelForXP(playerXP[5]); sendFrame126("Prayer: "+playerLevel[5]+"/"+getLevelForXP(playerXP[5])+"", 687); sendFrame126("" + getLevelForXP(playerXP[5]) + "", 4013); sendFrame126("" + playerLevel[5] + "", 4012); sM("You recharge your Prayer points."); } }

Read full topic
